text: I had an excellent experience at this clinic. The staff were professional, kind, and efficient. I didn’t have to wait long, and everything from check-in to consultation was smooth. The doctor was very knowledgeable and took time to explain my condition and treatment options. The clinic was clean and well-maintained, which made me feel comfortable and safe.

I had a great experience at Our Tampines Family Clinic. The staff was friendly, professional, and made me feel comfortable from the moment I walked in. The clinic was clean and well-organized, and the wait time was minimal. The doctor was attentive, explained everything clearly, and answered all my questions. I left feeling well cared for and confident in the treatment I received. Highly recommend!

Totally recommend Our Tampines Family Clinic. After trying from clinic to clinic, finally found the right one. Brought my children when they're ill and for vaccinations. Dr Tan is very professional, friendly and Dr Nic is precise attending to his patients. My children felt nervous at first but they felt at ease after. They were even given stickers. The staffs were professional and welcoming from the moment we walked in. The doctor and nurse took their time to explain everything clearly. One of our visits, we saw a small girl vomitted and the staffs were very attentive to her, comforting her.

I went in for my health screening appointment and the experience was great. The professionalism and friendliness of the staff were thumbs up and I didn't had to wait long. Clear explanations from the doctor and he patiently answered all my questions. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for quality care.

I had a great experience at this clinic. The waiting time was impressively short — I was seen almost immediately. The counter staff were professional, friendly, and very helpful throughout the process. It’s rare to find such efficiency and kindness in one place. Highly recommend this clinic!
